page.title: 19CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Children in the 1980's play many games to keep themselves amused. SCHOOL PLAYGOUND GAMES -These games usually fit in with the time of year. In Winter we skip - In Autumn we play "Conkers" - In Summer we like to play "Rounders" and in Spring we play "French Skipping". We also play many other games. "Football" and "Tig" are played all through the year. STREET GAMES -The main games here are "Tig" and "Football". Children also play on their bicycles and roller skates. Some of the games, for example "Hide And Seek","Bulldog" and "Redrover" can be rather noisy. PARK GAMES -Football and Cricket are the main games but Rounders, Athletics and "Tig" are also played.
